endPoints.description: Get a list of all users.
Must be an email of an active user. Will not truly delete the user, just disables them.

queryParameters.name: email
queryParameters.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu
queryParameters.description: The email of the user to be deleted.

endPoints.description: Create new user. Takes in a JSON body

queryParameters.name: email
queryParameters.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu
queryParameters.description: The email of the user to be deleted.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: The first name of the user.

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: The last name of the user.

attributes.name: email
attributes.type: string: email format, max len 40, required, must end with @uw.edu

attributes.name: role
attributes.type: admin | professor | facilitator | student | dev. This field is required.
attributes.description: The role of the user. Gives different permissions.

attributes.name: createdAt
attributes.description: The date and time when the user was created.

attributes.name: isActive
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user is active or inactive.

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: The date and time when the user was last updated.
